location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Hinde Pelly, Deputy Military Paymaster General, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter concerns disbursements in the Garrison Pay Office. Includes an extract of a letter, dated 10 May 1811, from James Farish, Acting Secretary to the Government at Bombay, to J Lickie, regarding the non-payment of a bill drawn by Bruce in favour of the Marine Agent.
